metadata.title: How to Log In to TERP
metadata.description: Step-by-step guide for logging into the TERP application

steps.title: Navigate to TERP
steps.description: Open your web browser and go to the TERP login page.

steps.title: Enter your email
steps.description: Type your email address in the email field.

steps.title: Enter your password
steps.description: Type your password in the password field.

steps.title: Click Sign In
steps.description: Click the Sign In button to access your account.
